title: 360 Revitalized
description: A remake of the Metro Storefront to Learn how Javascript Works.
advanced:
360 Revitalized is an open-source project aimed at recreating the classic Xbox 360 Store experience web.
Built with nostalgia in mind, this project provides a fresh yet familiar look and feel while retaining most of the features of the original Xbox 360 marketplace.  It serves as a practice tool for understanding JavaScript functionality and web development principles.

title: ACFman
description: A utility to share Steam ACF files easily.
advanced:
ACFMan, or ACF Manifestor, is a tool designed to simplify the sharing of manifest and ACF files. It allows users to easily share their Steam ACF files with others, offering a convenient solution for those who need to transfer or back up their game data.
I never finished this tool, but have plans to in the future.
